## Summary

- **Type:** (bugfix|feature|chore)
- **Related issue:** (e.g. #123)

## Description

Describe the changes introduced by this PR and why they are needed.

## Checklist

- [ ] My changes follow the project's coding standards
- [ ] I added or updated tests where applicable
- [ ] I ran `npm run typecheck`, `npm run lint`, and CI is passing
- [ ] I updated relevant documentation (if needed)

## Testing notes

Include steps to reproduce, test account details, or screenshots as needed.

## Branching / Commit message

- Use branch names like `feature/<short-desc>`, `fix/<short-desc>`, `chore/<short-desc>`
- Commit message format: `type(scope): short summary` (e.g. `fix(auth): handle token refresh`)

## Reviewers

Assign appropriate reviewers and add context for any special review needs.
